hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export WORK_DIR=`pwd` # Install packages sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y git wget tar curl # Set the variables export JAVA_HOME=/opt/ibm/java-s390x-80 export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin
cd $WORK_DIR git clone https://github.com/wildfly/wildfly.git cd wildfly git checkout 12.0.0.Final
# Download Apache Maven 3.3.9& set the variables wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/maven/maven-3/3.3.9/binaries/apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz tar -xf apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz
export PATH=$PWD/apache-maven-3.3.9/bin:$PATH export PATH=$PATH:$PWD/build/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final/bin export MAVEN_OPTS="-Xmx1024m" export JBOSS_HOME=$PWD/build/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final
# Build the Source mvn install #mvn -DsomeModule.test.excludes="**/*JmsClientTestCase.java" test -fn
#Verification # Start server in stand alone mode nohup sh ./dist/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final/bin/standalone.sh -b 0.0.0.0 -bmanagement 0.0.0.0 & sleep 60s curl http://localhost:8080 sleep 60s
pgrep -d" " -f "wildfly" | xargs kill;
sleep 20s # Start server in domain mode nohup sh ./dist/target/wildfly-12.0.0.Final/bin/domain.sh -b 0.0.0.0 -bmanagement 0.0.0.0 & sleep 60s
sleep 60s # Check server response curl http://localhost:8080
